description: This file defines a React-like component named 'RestaurantDetail' using the Blits.js library. It manages and displays restaurant details, including the name, description, and menu items. The component fetches restaurant data asynchronously when created and dynamically computes positions for menu items.

classes.name: RestaurantDetail
classes.description: A component that displays details of a restaurant, including its name, description, and menu items, with dynamic layout and data fetching.

methods.name: computePositions
methods.description: Calculates the layout positions for menu items based on the number of items, arranging them in a grid with 3 columns.

methods.name: updateHeaderTexts
methods.description: Updates the header texts for the restaurant name and description based on the current restaurant data.
